T02TD1550E:197a-1: shr'i badzra yo gi n'i s'a dha nam /
T02TD1550E:197a-3: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs //
T02TD1550E:197a-4: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1550E:197a-5: stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1550E:197a-6: khams gsum pa yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1550E:197a-9: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa ni //
T02TD1550E:197a-10: rtogs pa gcig gi spyod yul te //
T02TD1550E:197a-11: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs //
T02TD1550E:197a-12: mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02TD1550E:197a-13: sngags pas thog mar re zhig bla ma dang sangs rgyas rnams la mngon par gus pa'i yid kyis //
T02TD1550E:197a-14: byang chub kyi sems brtan por bzung ste /
T02TD1550E:197a-15: dbang bskur ba yang dag par thob nas /
T02TD1550E:197a-16: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin yang /
T02TD1550E:197b-0: rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum @197b tshogs pa la mngon du phyogs par bya ste /
T02TD1550E:197b-1: dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i dben pa'i gnas su stan 'jam po la rnal 'byor gyi rol pas rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas su bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
T02TD1550E:197b-2: de'i rjes la lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag par bya ba ni /
T02TD1550E:197b-3: rgun 'brum mam bu ram shing ngam /
T02TD1550E:197b-4: 'bras las byas pa'i btung ba bzang po ji ltar rnyed pa'i dam tshig lnga dang ldan par byas la mchod sbyin gyi snod du bzhag ste /
T02TD1550E:197b-5: yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis mngon par bsngags nas /
T02TD1550E:197b-6: chu de nyid kyis lag pa g-yon pa nas brtsams nas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad sngags kyi chus khrus bya zhing /
T02TD1550E:197b-7: de nyid kyis mchod pa'i rdzas kyang bsang gtor bya ba'o //
T02TD1550E:197b-9: aom bam hom yom hrim mom hrem hri h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD1550E:197b-10: ces bya ba'i sngags kyi yi ges lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo rnams la sbyar te /
T02TD1550E:197b-11: dag pa gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1550E:197b-12: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarbba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD1550E:197b-13: aom badzra shuddha: sarba dharm'a badzra shuddho& ham//
T02TD1550E:197b-14: aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02TD1550E:197b-15: de nas rang gi lus khams gsum po rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang du brtags te /
T02TD1550E:197b-16: skad cig tsam gyis lte ba'i skyil 'khor du rdo rje rnal 'byor ma phyag gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02TD1550E:197b-17: skra grol ba thur du 'phyang ba /
T02TD1550E:197b-19: gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa /
T02TD1550E:197b-20: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1550E:197b-21: sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1550E:197b-22: zla ba nyi ma me dkyil du //
T02TD1550E:197b-23: skyil krung phyed pas gnon mdzad cing //
T02TD1550E:197b-24: dza ba sindhu ra dang mtshungs //
T02TD1550E:197b-25: de lta'i gzugs can lha mo ni //
T02TD1550E:197b-26: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgom //
T02TD1550E:197b-27: de yi g-yas ni phag gdong ste //
T02TD1550E:197b-28: de bzhin g-yon pa khro mo nyid //
T02TD1550E:197b-29: kun rdzob don dam rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1550E:197b-30: zhal gnyis su ni rab tu grags //
T02TD1550E:197b-31: bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni //
T02TD1550E:197b-32: rim pa rgyas par rtogs par bya //
T02TD1550E:197b-33: de yi padma'i nang du ni //
T02TD1550E:197b-34: don kun sgrub byed 'khor lo bsgom //
T02TD1550E:197b-35: rim pa gsum gyis mtshan nas su //
T02TD1550E:197b-36: kha dog dmar po'i 'od zer can //
T02TD1550E:197b-37: sngags kyi yi ges yongs rdzogs nas //
T02TD1550E:197b-39: srin po'i zhal ni cung zhig bsdam //
T02TD1550E:197b-40: rab tu 'bar ba'i rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1550E:198a-3: phyag rgya gnyis po'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1550E:198a-5: rnal 'byor bdag nyid skad cig gis //
T02TD1550E:198a-7: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02TD1550E:198a-8: sngags btu ba yi cho ga mchog / gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' ba //
T02TD1550E:198a-9: rdo rje rol pa las byung ba'i //
T02TD1550E:198a-10: chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bshad pa //
T02TD1550E:198a-11: btsun mo'i bha ga nyid kyang de //
T02TD1550E:198a-12: a'a lo k'a li'i dbye bas der //
T02TD1550E:198a-13: sde tshan brgyad kyi rim pa ni //
T02TD1550E:198a-14: gzugs me mda' dang thub pa dang //
T02TD1550E:198a-15: bu ga drag po 'dod pa nyid //
T02TD1550E:198a-16: 'khor lo rnams ni rim bzhin du //
T02TD1550E:198a-17: man ngag gis ni dgod par bya //
T02TD1550E:198a-18: dang por aa nas brtsams nas su //
T02TD1550E:198a-19: yi ge ha yi mthar thug par //
T02TD1550E:198a-20: bskor ba'i tshul gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1550E:198a-21: bde mchog rgya mtsho gsung bzhin bri //
T02TD1550E:198a-22: dva yi thog ma sum 'gyur bya //
T02TD1550E:198a-23: thig le n'a ngas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1550E:198a-24: bha thog tsha thog yi ge nyid //
T02TD1550E:198a-25: ta yig thog mas mgo bor brgyan //
T02TD1550E:198a-26: tsa sa'i bar nas gzung byas te //
T02TD1550E:198a-28: sha thog sha thog 'brel ba ni //
T02TD1550E:198a-29: de bzhin sbyor bar shes par bya //
T02TD1550E:198a-30: li yi mgo gyur yi ge la //
T02TD1550E:198a-31: nya yi 'og nas gnas pas brgyan //
T02TD1550E:198a-32: pa thog ta yig 'og mar ldan //
T02TD1550E:198a-33: pha thog tha yig 'og mas bcings //
T02TD1550E:198a-34: ha ta'i bar gnas yi ge la //
T02TD1550E:198a-35: na yig thog na gnas pas brgyan //
T02TD1550E:198a-36: sha yi 'og na gnas pas gzung //
T02TD1550E:198a-38: ha yi steng gnas yi ge nyid //
T02TD1550E:198a-39: ra yig gong ma nyis brtsegs ldan //
T02TD1550E:198a-40: ta yig gong ma sbyar bya ste //
T02TD1550E:198a-41: mgo bo ru ni yongs su grags //
T02TD1550E:198a-42: pha yi thog na gnas pa la //
T02TD1550E:198a-43: tha yig thog na gnas pas brgyan //
T02TD1550E:198a-44: nya thog na thog gis brgyan pa //
T02TD1550E:198a-45: man ngag bzhin du shes par bya //
T02TD1550E:198a-46: tsa sa'i bar na gnas pa blang //
T02TD1550E:198a-48: de bzhin tsha yi gong ma zung //
T02TD1550E:198a-49: de bzhin ta yi steng mas brgyan //
T02TD1550E:198a-50: tha yi steng mas na 'og brgyan //
T02TD1550E:198a-51: pha yi 'og gnas yi ge blang //
T02TD1550E:198a-52: dha ba bar gnas yi ge blang //
T02TD1550E:198a-53: tha yi 'og mas brgyan pha nyid //
T02TD1550E:198a-54: yi ge nya la'i bar gnas pa //
T02TD1550E:198a-55: na yi gong mas brgyan par bya //
T02TD1550E:198a-56: sa'i bar gnas yi ge la /
T02TD1550E:198a-57: r'i yi 'og ma gdangs par bya //
T02TD1550E:198a-58: thig le n'a da mnyam ldan pa //
T02TD1550E:198b-0: gsum @198b 'gyur du ni dbye ba nyid //
T02TD1550E:198b-2: snga ma bzhin du sum 'gyur bya //
T02TD1550E:198b-3: sha 'og sha yi mgo mas brgyan //
T02TD1550E:198b-4: nya yi 'og na gnas pa sbyar //
T02TD1550E:198b-5: ma wa bar na gnas pa gzung //
T02TD1550E:198b-6: dzha yig gdong mas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1550E:198b-7: bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni //
T02TD1550E:198b-8: sngags btu ba ni shes par bya //
T02TD1550E:198b-9: glegs bam klog pa'i sngags pa yis //
T02TD1550E:198b-10: ji lta'i rim pa spangs pa yis //
T02TD1550E:198b-11: gang des bskal ba bye bar byas //
T02TD1550E:198b-12: dngos grub go 'phang mi thob pa //
T02TD1550E:198b-13: gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya ba //
T02TD1550E:198b-14: rdo rje can gyi mchod pa ni //
T02TD1550E:198b-15: tshes bcu'i dus su khyad par du //
T02TD1550E:198b-16: mchod pa lnga dang ldan gyur cing //
T02TD1550E:198b-17: bza' ston de bzhin btung ba dang //
T02TD1550E:198b-18: phyi dang gsang bar bcas par ldan //
T02TD1550E:198b-19: snod ni dri med sbyangs pa ru //
T02TD1550E:198b-20: gur kum la sogs sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1550E:198b-21: chu bzang po dang ldan pa la //
T02TD1550E:198b-23: gser gyi smyu gu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1550E:198b-24: blo dang ldan pas ae dbyibs bris //
T02TD1550E:198b-25: dbus su sngags kyi rgyal po ni //
T02TD1550E:198b-26: rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya //
T02TD1550E:198b-27: g-yung drung 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1550E:198b-28: dge ba'i 'khor lo'i logs la dgod //
T02TD1550E:198b-29: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs nyid //
T02TD1550E:198b-30: chu las skyes dang thang las skyes //
T02TD1550E:198b-31: mar me ts'a ru dam tshig che //
T02TD1550E:198b-32: de bzhin gzhon nu ma yang mchod //
T02TD1550E:198b-33: mchod pa'i khyad par 'di dag ni //
T02TD1550E:198b-34: nges pa nyid du bya ba yin //
T02TD1550E:198b-35: skra grol gcer bur byas nas ni //
T02TD1550E:198b-36: sdar bshad phyogs bcu bltas nas kyang //
T02TD1550E:198b-37: shin tu gsang bar bya ba nyid //
T02TD1550E:198b-38: mchod pa'i dus su mnyam par gzhag //
T02TD1550E:198b-39: ma gsang bgegs ni skye 'gyur te //
T02TD1550E:198b-40: dngos grub de bzhin nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1550E:198b-41: dam tshig nyams par gyur pa na //
T02TD1550E:198b-43: srog ni gtong bar gyur pa yis //
T02TD1550E:198b-44: 'chi ba'i dus la bab kyang bla'i //
T02TD1550E:198b-45: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
T02TD1550E:198b-46: dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1550E:198b-47: khams gsum brtan dang g-yo ba yis //
T02TD1550E:198b-49: g-yon pa sngon du bskyod bya ste ;
T02TD1550E:198b-50: / rnal 'byor rtag tu g-yon pas spyad //
T02TD1550E:198b-51: mchod pa lag pa g-yon pas ta //
T02TD1550E:198b-52: bza' btung g-yon pas bya ba nyid //
T02TD1550E:198b-53: rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa //
T02TD1550E:198b-54: rigs gcig tu ni brtag par bya //
T02TD1550E:198b-55: bza' dang bza' min de bzhin btung //
T02TD1550E:198b-56: sme gtsang ngo tsha rnam par spangs //
T02TD1550E:199a-0: rtog pa kun las nges par @199a * //
T02TD1550E:199a-2: / rtsod pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02TD1550E:199a-3: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02TD1550E:199a-4: dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyod //
T02TD1550E:199a-5: sngags ni rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin //
T02TD1550E:199a-6: rnal 'byor ma ni sngags kyi gzugs //
T02TD1550E:199a-8: de dag tha dad par mi bya //
T02TD1550E:199a-9: mi yis gang dang gang bsgom pa //
T02TD1550E:199a-10: yid dang yang dag ldan byas nas //
T02TD1550E:199a-11: des na de yi bdag nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1550E:199a-12: sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no //
T02TD1550E:199a-13: sems dang rjes mthun rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1550E:199a-14: gang zhig shin tu goms byed na //
T02TD1550E:199a-15: mi gang bsod nams dman pa yang //
T02TD1550E:199a-16: de ni grub 'gyur the tshom med //
T02TD1550E:199a-17: bla ma sangs rgyas bla ma chos //
T02TD1550E:199a-18: de bzhin bal ma dge 'dun te //
T02TD1550E:199a-19: bla ma dpal ldan rdo rje can //
T02TD1550E:199a-20: 'dir ni bla ma bla med pa'o //
T02TD1550E:199a-22: de phyir bla ma bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD1550E:199a-23: dpal dang ldan pa'i rub tu sngags pa'i gnas au rgyan nas byung ba'i dgongs pa bla na med pa dpa' rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gsang chen rna ba nas rna ba ru zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa'i rim pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1550E:199a-25: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bsod nams 'byung gnas bzang po'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02TD1550E:199a-26: bod kyi lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o//
